archimate:Requirement.name: R1.7 Q&A repository communication plan
archimate:Requirement.documentation:
Q&A repository communication plan as part of Security Awareness project
U16 As Q&A repository project owner, I need support with communication and promotion for QA Repository project to avoid duplicate work and save time and effort and focus more on the core tasks.
30/5 Unclear whether this project will continue. Set this and its sub-requirements to "Won't Have" in the meantime.
